text: Wardböhmen is a village administered by the Lower Saxon town of Bergen in the northern part of Celle on the Lüneburg Heath in North Germany. It is about north of Bergen on the B 3 federal road. == Literature == * Hermann v.d. Kammer: Geschichte der Ortschaft Wardböhmen mit den Ortsteilen Hoope und Sehlhof. Bergen 1997 ==References== == Other websites == *Information about Wardböhmen Category:Villages in Lower Saxony Category:Bergen, Lower Saxony Category:Lüneburg Heath Category:Celle (district)
title: Wardböhmen
